name: Borderspace (noisemod)
description:
As players engage in fast-paced dogfights and try to outmaneuver their opponents, they'll have the freedom to customize their ships and weapon loadouts to suit their play style. With a variety of unique ship designs and weapons to choose from, players can experiment with different combinations to find the perfect setup for their strategy.

Borderspace is in active development, with new features and updates being added regularly. The game currently supports 2-4 local players.
